review: Fast performance and easy access to Amazon content. The menu interface can be a little kludgy, and the appearance of two identical items --  a trailer ("Episode 0") and the program itself ("Episode 1")  side by side for each Amazon pilot was confusing at first. A particularly useful feature is that the device automatically self-selects my Sony TV's input when powering on, saving me a couple of menu clicks and a switch to the TV remote. I wish the more interesting "free" content channels like Kino Lorber had deeper content offerings -- Hulu Plus does it right with its wide selection of Criterion titles.
author: Swolf
